name: Cells (ShyXe)
description:
What the game is about

Cells is about progress. You start with nothing, collect resources from nature and combine them to increase your efficiency and technology.

How do you play?

You can use the interactive tutorial, which is included in the game, but when you start playing it could be rather confusing than helping.

W, A, S, D - Movement

TAB - Open/ close inventory

1-8, X, Y - Choose, switch between items

F - Interact with the world

E - Use the coosen item from your inventory

G - Drop an item on the ground

Q - Choose a secondary item for the crafting process

R - Combine the highlighted item and the secondary item to something new, also known as crafting

You get a book with all crafting combinations at the end of the build-in tutorial, which you can enable in the options.

This game is in early access

We started working on this game a long time ago, it's definitely not complete and if you like it, we'll update the game soon.
